subtasks: Sit on the tractor seat
Engage the tractor's transmission
Adjust the tractor's direction with the steering wheel
Manipulate the throttle to control speed
Attach farming implements such as plough or harrow
Walk through the field observing crops
Bend down to inspect individual plants
Compare current growth stage to expected timeline
Enter the pesticide equipment room
Pour pesticide into sprayer tank
Connect nozzles to the main spray lines
Load the sprayer with pressurized fluid
Drive the sprayer through the field maintaining uniform passage
Assemble the combines harvesters
Seat inside the cabin for operation
Adjust cutting blades and cleaning fans
Monitor grain tank filling
Discharge harvested grain into storage bins
Open the gate to the pens
Distribute feed into the troughs
Manage water supply for animals
Remove uneaten feed and manure
Approach the cow's udder
Clean the teats with disinfectant
Attach the milking unit
Milk until completion and clean the unit
Review the tractor's service manual
Replace a broken seat belt
Tighten loose bolts on the equipment
Load seed into the planter
Position the planter in the field
Start planting operation row by row
Adjust planting depth and seed placement
Open the chicken coop door
Collect eggs from the nests
Place collected eggs in a basket
Clean any spilled manure
Inspect sprinklers for leaks
Check valves for proper functioning
Adjust water pressure to maintain coverage
